hero.title: Bharath is a data scientist and ML engineer
hero.description: He builds intelligent systems where data meets machine learning

about.title: about
description: I'm a Computer Science and Data Science undergraduate at New Horizon College of Engineering in Bengaluru, India. I specialize in machine learning, data analysis, and building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems.

My passion lies in transforming raw data into meaningful insights and developing ML models that can make a difference. I enjoy working on projects involving NLP, computer vision, and web development. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and contribute to open-source projects.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I'm interested in data science and machine learning opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don't hesitate to contact me

description: I'm a Computer Science and Data Science undergraduate at New Horizon College of Engineering in Bengaluru, India. I specialize in machine learning, data analysis, and building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems.
My passion lies in transforming raw data into meaningful insights and developing ML models that can make a difference. I enjoy working on projects involving NLP, computer vision, and web development.
I'm always eager to learn new technologies and contribute to open-source projects. I have experience with various ML frameworks and enjoy tackling challenging problems in data science.

facts.title: fun-facts
list: I love working with data and finding patterns
I enjoy contributing to open-source projects
Python is my favorite programming language
I'm passionate about machine learning and AI
